mapper.insert: insert into users (username, password, first_name, last_name, postal_card) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{postal_card})
mapper.select: select u.id as user_id, u.username, u.password, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.postal_card, o.id as order_id, o.user_id, o.payment_info, o.shipping_info, oi.item_id, i.name as item_name, i.description as item_description, i.price as item_price from users u left join orders o on u.id = o.user_id left join order_items oi on o.id = oi.order_id left join items i on oi.item_id = i.id where u.id = #{userId} and o.id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, first_name = #{first_name}, last_name = #{last_name}, postal_card = #{postal_card} where id = #{id}
